DataElement.preferredName: Patient Lesser Control Diabetes Mellitus Eligibility Determination Code Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The coded response indicating whether a patient meets the eligibility criteria with regards to having poorly controlled diabetes.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Lesser Control Diabetes Mellitus Eligibility Determination
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to criteria to determine eligibility of patients for medical care programs and services based on poorly controlled diabetes.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: Lesser Control Diabetes Mellitus Eligibility Determination
Property.preferredDefinition: Of lower rank, degree, or importance; of reduced size, extent, or degree; more limited in quantity.:The act of directing or determining; regulation or maintenance of a function or action; a relation of constraint of one entity (thing or person or group) by another.:(dye-a-BEE-teez) A disease in which the body does not properly control the amount of sugar in the blood. As a result, the level of sugar in the blood is too high. This disease occurs when the body does not produce enough insulin or does not use it properly.:Criteria to determine eligibility of patients for medical care programs and services.

Concepts.definition: Of lower rank, degree, or importance; of reduced size, extent, or degree; more limited in quantity.
The act of directing or determining; regulation or maintenance of a function or action; a relation of constraint of one entity (thing or person or group) by another.
A metabolic disorder characterized by abnormally high blood sugar levels due to diminished production of insulin or insulin resistance/desensitization.
The act of determining if a subject is suitable for enrollment in a study according specific protocol criteria and procedures.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

DataElementConcept.origin: GOG CRF:Gynecologic Oncology Group Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Indicator to represent a response of Yes, No, or Not Applicable._The affirmative response to a question or activity._The non-affirmative response to a question._Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context._A system of numbered categories for representation of data.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator
RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.:The non-affirmative response to a question.:Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context.:A system of numbered categories for representation of data.:An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.
The non-affirmative response to a question.
Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.
A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created to support Theradex design of CRFs for NCI CCR trials

ReferenceDocuments.name: Does patient have poorly cont
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have poorly controlled diabetes?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: If patient has been assigned to receive everolimus, does patient have poorly controlled diabetes?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have uncontrolled diabetes mellitus (fasting plasma glucose greater than 130 mg/dL or 7.2 mmol/L)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have uncontrolled Type I or II diabetes mellitus, defined as HbA1c greater than 8.5%?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 4
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have uncontrolled Type I or II diabetes mellitus, defined as fasting blood glucose of greater than 160 mg/dL and HgA1c greater than 8.5%?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 5
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have uncontrolled Type I or II diabetes mellitus, defined as fasting blood glucose of greater than 120 mg/dL?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 7
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have Type 1 or Type 2 diabetes mellitus requiring insulin?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 8
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have uncontrolled type I or II diabetes mellitus, defined as fasting blood glucose greater than 160 mg/dL and HbA1c greater than 8%?
